TRANSMISSION (AUTOMATIC), Remove & Reinstall

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R seat(s) when required
3. R&R cab floor pan when required
4. R&R Driveshaft
5. R&R starter
6. R&R muffler/exhaust when required
7. R&R wheels when required and torque to spec
8. R&R caliper as required
9. R&R U-Bolts when required
10. R&R Front axle as required
11. Adjust shift cable linkage

Notes:
1. Allison automatic transmission operations are for use in accessing rear engine repairs

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours

Automatic Transmission T444E H13-101Z 3000RE 2.8
Allison Transmission (AT Series) DT466E/530E A13-1101 All Others 4.4

TRANSMISSION (MANUAL), Remove & Reinstall

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R Driveshaft
3. R&R shift lever assembly
4. R&R interior panels, seats, engine cover, floor mat and floor pan when required
5. R&R aerodynamic skirting, air tanks, air dryer, and cross member when required
6. Check and adjust clutch

Notes:
1. For use with repair or replace operations for transmissions, clutch, flywheel and rear engine repairs

TRANSMISSION ASSEMBLY - END LOADED (TRANSMISSION REMOVED), Repair

Includes:
1. Disassemble, clean, inspect, replace failed components and reassembly
2. Drain/Refill oil
3. R&R yoke, clutch housing/cross shaft, slave valve, shift cover assembly, input and output shaft/bearing/seal as required
4. Press work to remove/install gears and bearings as required
5. Steam clean
6. Road test

Excludes:
1. TRANSMISSION (MANUAL), REMOVE & REINSTALL

TRANSMISSION REAR SECTION (TRANSMISSION IN CHASSIS), Repair

Includes:
1. Disassemble, clean, inspect, replace failed components and reassembly
2. Steam clean
3. R&R Driveshaft
4. R&R yoke, rear mainshaft bearing/shaft/seal, rear section and auxiliary drive gear
5. Press work to remove/install gears and bearings as required
6. Road test

Notes:
1. This operation may not be used when replacing another component requiring transmission removal. Refer instead to the (Transmission Removed) operation
2. Refer to Rear Section Synchronizer / Shift Fork, Replace when replacing only those components.
